backend/main.mo: Defines types and CRUD logic for job posts, user profiles, and access control, including admin-protected post creation and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based design tokens for light/dark themes and shared styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages including admin and client-admin areas wrapped in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Ima: Editor block for setting an image URL and alt text with a live preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Lin: Block editor for configuring a button label and its target URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Par: Block editor allowing input of paragraph text content.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tab: Editor for creating and modifying table rows, columns, and cell values with optional title.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tit: Block editor for entering heading text and selecting H2 or H3 level.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteJobP: Provides a confirmation dialog for permanently deleting a job post with disable states.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostBlo: Allows admins to add, edit, rearrange, and delete structured content blocks for job posts.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostFor: Form component for creating or editing job posts with fields for images, dates, fees, vacancies, links, and custom blocks.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Floating tool for uploading an image, storing it in localStorage, previewing it, and copying its data URL or HTML snippet.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied or login required message with optional login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that shows a fallback UI and reset button when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/home/Preparation: Home page section presenting study resources with links to books and courses.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickOffici: Renders a card listing official links from a hook, showing highlighted links with styled buttons and fallback text if empty.
frontend/src/components/home/SimpleJobsS: Displays a list of quick job updates with title, category, last date, and a notification link, hidden if no jobs exist.
frontend/src/components/home/StudyCorner: Shows study material categories in an accordion with items linking to resources, falling back to messages when empty.
frontend/src/components/home/VerticalTic: Creates a vertically scrolling ticker with pause-on-hover and reduced-motion support by duplicating content for looping.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Impor: Renders three major job action buttons with availability checks and fallback states based on link status.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobDe: Renders multiple tables showing important dates, fees, age limits, and other job post details using data from a JobPost object.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobPo: Displays dynamic job post content blocks including titles, paragraphs, links, images, and tables.
Shows a job poster image with fallback gradient styling when the image is missing or fails to load.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Usefu: Generates a table of important job-related links with availability status and download actions.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalBann: Displays a simple motivational banner with Hindi text.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, login, admin links, and content outlet.
frontend/src/components/SiteNoticeTicker: Shows a scrolling marquee notice with repeated update text and an animated bell icon.
frontend/src/features/homeCards/homeCard: Manages home card items in localStorage with CRUD operations and default seeded data.
frontend/src/features/officialLinks/offi: Stores and manages official links in localStorage, supporting CRUD and drag-based reordering.
frontend/src/features/simpleJobs/simpleJ: Handles simple job entries in localStorage with add, fetch, and delete operations.
frontend/src/features/studyCorner/studyC: Manages study categories and items in localStorage with defaults and full CRUD for categories and items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmitCardPosts.ts: Fetches admit card posts from the backend actor using React Query when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts: Provides a simple localStorage‑based admin unlock mechanism with login and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeCards.ts: Exposes home card items via a reactive store with methods to add, update, and delete entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks if the authenticated user is an admin by querying the actor, integrating identity and actor loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPost.ts: Fetches a single job post by ID from the backend actor with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostMutations.t: Defines add, update, and delete mutations for job posts and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPosts.ts: Loads job posts filtered by category using the backend actor with caching support.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLinks.ts: Manages official links stored in localStorage, providing add, update, delete, and reorder helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimpleJobs.ts: Manages a simple jobs list in localStorage with functions to add and remove jobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyCorner.ts: Handles study categories and items stored in localStorage with full CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyllabusRepository: Fetches the syllabus repository job posts from the backend actor with caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, typography, accessibility tweaks, and custom UI utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard providing panels for managing job posts, official links, study corner items, and other admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditJobPos: Admin page for creating or editing a job post using a form, with save logic and navigation handling.
Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting job posts with dialogs and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AdmitCardHallPage.tsx: Displays a list of admit card posts with loading, error, and empty states, including link status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx: Admin login and panel allowing management of simple jobs, official links, and home card items with add, edit, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying categorized job sections with backend and fallback items, plus official links and study resources.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays full job post details including hero banner, blocks, tables, and important links with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusRepositoryPag: Lists syllabus PDFs with availability checks, loading states, and links to related job posts.
frontend/src/utils/linkAvailability.ts: Provides a helper that returns availability status and label based on whether a URL is non-empty.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageStore.ts: Implements a reactive localStorage wrapper with key‑scoped listeners, snapshot caching, and change notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, fonts, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, feature requests, and admin login password/security rules.
